name: RAYSTORM HD
description: The classic shooting game RAYSTORM returns with the original gameplay and newly-updated graphics. Players control the R-GRAY, a fighter plane equipped with a lock-on laser system, and battle their way through a total of 8 stages. A variety of game modes includes Arcade Mode and Extra Mode, with a total of 4 selectable planes including the untested new R-GEAR. Rankings can be registered, and replay data can be uploaded and downloaded online. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
